Title: The Full Monty
Production_Co: Redwave Films, Channel Four Films, Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
Cast: Robert Carlyle, Mark Addy, William Snape, Steve Huison, Tom Wilkinson, Paul Barber, Hugo Speer, Lesley Sharp, Emily Woof, Deirdre Costello, Paul Butterworth, Dave Hill, Bruce Jones, Andrew Livingston, Vinny Dhillon
Plot: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity. Six unemployed steel workers, inspired by the Chippendale's dancers, form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity. Written by Jon Reeves (from press kit) <jreeves@imdb.com>
Keywords: steel worker, unemployment, male stripper, northern england, dole
Location: ASDA Supermarket, Orgreave Way, Sheffield, South Yorkshire, England, UK
Actors: Robert Carlyle, Tom Wilkinson, Mark Addy
Description: Directed by Peter Cattaneo.  With Robert Carlyle, Tom Wilkinson, Mark Addy, William Snape. Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.
